title: Brilliant Copy Writer Desired Who Can Sell With Words
snippet: In the world of automated marketing everyone seems to put a lot of effort into the right technical solutions. I believe that its still the arguments you make and the attention that you grab that helps you convert interest into sales and sales into a loyal customer. Do you have that understanding of how automated marketing works with the knowledge of what works to get someone to buy something? We are looking for talent? Someone who gets us and our products? Ideally if you are in the New York Market you will be able to experience our brand and know our customers. We are about to launch some new b2b saas products that need a great email and digital marketing flow using smart messaging.
